question:
Computers are often argued to be the most important invention of the last hundred years. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?


Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.


You should spend about 40 minutes on this task.
text: The tourism in Saudi Arabia has changed since 2015. Many aspects are developed in a lot of cities like:
Riyadh, Jeddah , especially in the south of Saudi Arabia it’s called Abha.
Abha city became the best tourist place around Saudi Arabia , Because the climate at Abha it’s Extraordinary . Abha it’s picturesque place due to its mountains nature covered withe trees .
Also There is many guides groups they concern to arrange your activities and made a thorough planning for the visitors .
Some of Saudi advantages The tourism in Saudi Arabia it’s very affordable .
The hotels it’s very comfortable . Tourist places it’s amazing . Restaurants and Cafés it’s international standard.Medical care it’s in high level . Emergency situation 7/24 .

I would like to talk about 2030 vision of Saudi Arabia . It’s consider a qualitative leap for the kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It’s a Saudi project that aims to improve the economy of Saudi Arabia instead of depending on oil. So, I think this project will be a Qualitative leap in Saudi tourism.
Also Saudi Arabia it's the biggest country for Islamic people. There are many spiritual spots that people come to visit from around the world like : Makkah and Madinah.

I would like to talk about my favorite part of Saudi Arabis, The coastal city ex:Jeddah, Jazan, Khobar and yonboa. These cities it's an amazing places and tourist attractions. There is much of resorts, restaurants, hotels on sea view with fun-filled staying .
Saudi Arabia it’s incredible spot and many many of different cultures and amazing cosines that make you very happy Ha ha ha . Welcome to saudi counrty.
